title: Get a MacBook Pro for less with $260 off this refurbished laptop
content:
Macworld

An Apple laptop is a useful addition to anybody’s work kit. This refurbished MacBook Pro offers all the power and ease of use of a Mac at a better price now through the end of January 21st.

This refurbished MacBook Pro is constructed around an Intel Core i5 processor with two cores and a 2.3GHz clock speed, backed up by 8GB of RAM and 128 GB of hard drive storage. The 13.3″ Retina display offers crisp graphics, with a resolution of 2560 by 1600 pixels perfect for work and streaming. All of this is supported by a battery that keeps running for up to ten hours, and in a package that weighs just over three pounds.

Each MacBook is reviewed and inspected before shipping and given a grade. These Macs are graded “B,” which means there may be some light signs of use on the casing, but the unit itself works as if it came from the factory.

Boost your Mac game with this refurbished MacBook Pro for $439.97, $260 off the $699 MSRP, now through the end of January 21st.

 

Apple MacBook Pro 13.3″ Core i5, 8GB RAM 128GB HDD – Space Gray (Refurbished) – $439.97
